El proyecto consiste en una aplicación c: The project consists of a comprehensive paddle court reservation application. One type of user can create courts with their specific schedules and prices, while other users can make reservations for these courts.
El objetivo principal es eliminar a la p: The main objective is to eliminate the intermediary person responsible for attending to customers, booking the courts, and automate the process.
El proyecto consiste en una réplica de c: The project consists of a replica of coches.net and flexicar where users can view used cars and contact the seller.
Los coches son importados de coches.net: The cars are imported from coches.net and flexicar using web scraping techniques
